TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalServiceSecuritySettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可以設定的本機服務安全性屬性。

span.span: Provides local service security properties that can be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別包含 用來建立安全性通道的本機安全性設定。This class contains the local security settings used by the to build the security channel. 這些是服務的本機設定，而且不會在服務的安全性原則中表示。These settings are local to the service and are not represented in the service's security policy. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何使用 類別來變更 設定。This example shows how to use the class to change the setting. MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan InactivityTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定通道因為無活動而關閉之前所等待的持續期間。

span.span: Gets or sets the duration to wait before the channel is closed due to inactivity.

value.span: ，表示與用戶端之間的安全性工作階段因為無活動而關閉之前，所等候的持續期間。

span.span: A that represents the duration to wait before the security session with the client is closed due to inactivity.

value.span: 預設值為 2 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 2 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在安全對話工作階段中，請注意這個屬性和繫結上的 `ReceiveTimeout` 屬性都會影響工作階段逾時。In a secure conversation session, note that both this property and the `ReceiveTimeout` property on the binding affect session timeout. 其中時間較短的屬性值會決定逾時發生的時間。The shorter of the two determines when timeouts occur. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有用戶端認證類型。All client credential types for and . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已啟用。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled. - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在與 = `true`或 = `true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 不適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 針對 。For . - 針對 。For . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在與 = `true`或都未屬性設定為`true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 `InactivityTimeout` 值。This example shows how get the `InactivityTimeout` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan IssuedCookieLifetime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定服務針對用戶端發出之 的存留期 (Lifetime)。

span.span: Gets or sets the lifetime for the that the service issues for the client.

value.span: 表示新安全性 Cookie 存留期的 。

span.span: A that represents the lifetime for new security cookies.

value.span: 預設為 10 小時。

span.span: The default is 10 hours.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當服務對用戶端發出安全對話 Cookie 權杖時，其有效期間是由這個屬性的值所決定。When the service issues secure conversation cookie tokens to the client, their validity period is determined by the value of this property. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 `IssuedCookieLifetime` 值。This example shows how to get the `IssuedCookieLifetime` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxCachedCookies { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定此服務允許一次快取之 數目的上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of s that the service allows to cache at once.

value.span: 此服務可快取之安全對話 Cookie 數目的上限。

span.span: The maximum number of secure conversation cookies that can be cached by the service.

value.span: 當到達這個限制時，此服務會移除最舊的快取安全對話 Cookie，以騰出空間供新的安全對話 Cookie 使用。

span.span: When this limit is reached the service removes the oldest cached secure conversation cookies to make room for new secure conversation cookies.

value.span: 預設值為 1000。

span.span: The default is 1000.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 `MaxCachedCookies` 值。This example shows how to get the `MaxCachedCookies` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MaxClockSkew { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定通訊雙方系統時鐘之間可允許的最大時間差異。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: ，表示通訊雙方系統時鐘之間的最大允許時間差異。

span.span: A that represents the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: 預設值是 5 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 5 分鐘。The default value for this property is 5 minutes. 沒有通過傳送時間測試的訊息會遭到拒絕。Messages that do not pass the send-time test are rejected. 這個屬性會配合訊息時間戳記驗證和 屬性一起使用。This property is used in conjunction with the message timestamp verification and the property. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 `MaxClockSkew` 值。This example shows how to get the `MaxClockSkew` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#6)]

exception.span: 此屬性設定為小於 0 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPendingSessions { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與伺服器之間建立並行安全性工作階段的數目上限，此伺服器已經針對這些並行安全性工作階段發出工作階段權杖，但未傳送任何應用程式訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent security sessions that are established with the server for which it has issued a session token but for which no application messages are sent.

value.span: 並行安全性工作階段數目的上限。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent security sessions.

value.span: 預設值為 128。

span.span: The default is 128.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 `MaxPendingSessions` 值。This example shows how to get the `MaxPendingSessions` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#7)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#7)]

exception.span: 此屬性設定為小於 0 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxStatefulNegotiations { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與用戶端之間的並行安全性交涉 (此服務可參與) 數目的上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent security negotiations with clients that the service can participate in.

value.span: 與用戶端之間的並行安全性交涉 (此服務可參與) 數目的上限。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent security negotiations with clients that the service can participate in.

value.span: 預設值為 128。

span.span: The default is 128.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超過這個限制的交涉工作階段會遭到拒絕，並將 SOAP 錯誤傳回用戶端。Negotiation sessions in excess of this limit are rejected and a SOAP fault is sent back to the client. 用戶端通常必須在稍後重試，好讓服務上的現有交涉有一些時間可以完成。The client typically must retry later, which allows some time for existing negotiations on the service to complete. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何設定 `MaxStatefulNegotiations` 值。This example shows how set the `MaxStatefulNegotiations` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#8)]

exception.span: 此屬性設定為小於 0 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan NegotiationTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用戶端與服務之間安全性交涉階段的最長持續期間。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum duration of the security negotiation phase between client and service.

value.span: ，表示用戶端與服務之間安全性交涉階段的最長持續期間。

span.span: A that represents the maximum duration of the security negotiation phase between client and service.

value.span: 與服務之間的任何交涉 (例如，在訊息層級 SPNego 或 SSL 驗證期間) 都必須在這段時間內完成。

span.span: Any negotiation with the service (for example during message level SPNego or SSL authentication) must complete within this time.

value.span: 預設為 1 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 1 minute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超出這個限制，便會擲回例外狀況。If this limit is exceeded, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例將示範如何取得這個屬性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. span.span: The property is set to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::NonceCache ^ NonceCache { System::ServiceModel::Security::NonceCache ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::NonceCache ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定本機服務安全性設定的快取。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache for the local service security settings.

value.span: 本機服務安全性設定的快取。

span.span: The cache for the local service security settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReconnectTransportOnFailure { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出安全性工作階段是否會在傳輸失敗之後嘗試重新連線。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures.

value.span: 如果安全性工作階段會在傳輸失敗之後嘗試重新連線，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個旗標設定為 `true`，則表示此服務允許用戶端透過多個傳輸連線來傳送對應至單一安全性工作階段的訊息。If this flag is set to `true`, the service allows the client to send messages that correspond to a single security session over multiple transport connections. 這種設定對於安全 WS-ReliableMessaging 而言相當有用，因為用戶端會要求工作階段能夠容忍暫時的傳輸失敗。This is useful in the case of secure WS-ReliableMessaging because the client requires the session to tolerate transient transport failures. ## Examples 這個範例將示範如何取得這個屬性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReplayCacheSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於重新執行偵測的 Nonce 快取大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the nonce cache used for replay detection.

value.span: 用於重新執行偵測的 Nonce 快取大小。

span.span: The size of the nonce cache used for replay detection.
The default is 900,000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nonce 是一次使用的數目。A nonce is a "number used once". 如果超過 Nonce 計數，傳入訊息就會遭到拒絕並擲回 。If the nonce count is exceeded, the incoming message is rejected and a is thrown. 舊的 Nonce 會及時移除。Old nonces are removed in a timely manner. ## Examples 這個範例將示範如何取得這個屬性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#11)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ReplayWindow { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定服務可接受訊息的時間上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time within which the service can accept a message.

value.span: ，表示服務可接受訊息的時間上限。

span.span: A that represents the maximum amount of time within which the service can accept a message.

value.span: 預設值是 5 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nonce 是一次使用的數目。A nonce is a "number used once". 服務會拒絕在過去傳送超過 持續時間的所有訊息。The service rejects all messages that are sent more than the duration in the past. 到達 `ReplayWindow` 內的訊息會檢查其 Nonce，看看是否是唯一的。Messages that arrive within the `ReplayWindow` have their nonce checked for uniqueness. ## Examples 這個範例將示範如何取得這個屬性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#12)]

exception.span: 此屬性設定為小於 0 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan SessionKeyRenewalInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於安全性工作階段的金鑰存留期。

span.span: Gets or sets the lifetime of a key used in a security session.

summary.span: 當這個期限過期時，會自動更新此金鑰。

span.span: When this interval expires the key is automatically renewed.

value.span: 時間範圍，經過這段期間之後服務會要求起始端更新用於安全性工作階段的金鑰。

span.span: The time span after which the service requires that the initiator renew the key used for the security session.

value.span: 如果起始端未在這段時間內更新金鑰，此服務會將錯誤傳回給起始端。

span.span: If the initiator does not renew the key within this time the service sends back a fault to the initiator.

value.span: 預設為 15 小時前。

span.span: The default is 15 hours.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有用戶端認證類型。All client credential types for and . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已啟用。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled. - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在與 = `true`或 = `true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 不適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 針對 。For . - 針對 。For . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在與 = `true`或都未屬性設定為`true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 這個範例將示範如何取得這個屬性的值。This example shows how get the value of this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#13)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan SessionKeyRolloverInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定前一個工作階段金鑰在金鑰更新期間對傳入訊息屬有效的時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval after key renewal for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages during a key renewal.

value.span: 在金鑰更新之後，傳入訊息上前一個工作階段金鑰有效的時間間隔。

span.span: The time interval after key renewal for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages after a key renewal.

value.span: 預設值是 5 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在金鑰更新之後，用戶端和伺服器都必須使用最新的可用金鑰來傳送訊息。After key renewal, the client and server should always send messages using the most current available key. 雙方都會接受由前一個工作階段金鑰保護的傳入訊息，直到變換時間逾期。Both parties can accept incoming messages secured with the previous session key until the rollover time expires. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有用戶端認證類型。All client credential types for and . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已啟用。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled. - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在與 = `true`或 = `true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 不適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 針對 。For . - 針對 。For . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在與 = `true`或都未屬性設定為`true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 `SessionKeyRolloverInterval` 值。This example shows how get the `SessionKeyRolloverInterval` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#14)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#14)]

exception.span: 此屬性設定為小於 0 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimestampValidityDuration { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定服務所傳送之訊息有效的最長持續時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum duration of time that messages are valid when sent by the service.

summary.span: 如果用戶端在這段期間之後收到服務的訊息，它會捨棄該訊息。

span.span: If the client receives the service's message after this duration, it discards the message.

value.span: 服務所傳送之訊息有效的最長持續時間。

span.span: The maximum duration of time that messages are valid when sent by the service.

value.span: 預設值是 5 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.
